help:
The Race Minimap shows the course of the current race track in a simplified way. The line draws a windrose path from checkpoint to checkpoint, and the dots each represent a player and their position on said track. The larger dot indicates your own position.
Commands ------------------------ /minimap - Opens/closes the settings GUI /minimap_toggle - Toggles the Minimap itself
Tip: Use "/bind k minimap_toggle" to bind the command to the "k" key
Predefined Keys ------------------------ F6 (short press) - Toggles the Race Minimap F6 (long press) - Opens/closes the settings GUI
(The key may have been changed by the serveradmin.)
